#cloud-config
users:
  - default
  - name: marantuser
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    shell: /bin/bash
    groups: sudo, docker
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - ssh-rsa  jerem@Jeremy_VICTUS

package_update: true
package_upgrade: true

runcmd:
  - apt-get update && apt-get install -y docker.io
  - usermod -aG docker marantuser
  - systemctl enable --now docker
  - docker pull alpine:latest
